maps.convert.legacy2gml

Class NodeInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • maps.convert.legacy2gml.NodeInfo

  • public class NodeInfo
extends java.lang.Object
    Container for node information during conversion.

      • process

        public void process(LegacyMap legacy,
           GMLMap gml,
           java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,RoadInfo> roadInfo,

        Process the node and create GMLRoad objects if required.
        Parameters:
        legacy - The legacy map.
        gml - The GML map.
        roadInfo - A map from road ID to RoadInfo.
        buildingInfo - A map from building ID to BuildingInfo.
